hero.headline: Amp up your camp
hero.tagline: Find all the latest gear to make your wildest outdoor dreams come true.

promos.text: Convertible bags and season-spanning clothes for long-awaited trips or close-to-home adventures.
Take wing with the latest trail shoes, featherweight packs and technical layers for running offroad miles.
Garmin tech to stay connected, on route and on track with your training. Limited time only.
